so why did we choose a bit so fluent bit
is a lightweight solution and that
really aligned with
osm's goal of keeping things lightweight
but more importantly it's super
customizable and pluggable which means
that we're able to offer our users
a pretty vendor neutral approach to
logging because there's so many
inputs filters and output plugins
available in fluent bit
that users can really configure it to
their own customized logging experience
there's also tags and matching that

in their pipeline it's also important
that fluidbit is cloud native which made
